edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Singletons

Class Poller

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Singletons.Poller

  • public class Poller
extends java.lang.Object

    Poller Class!

    The poller class is what is responsible for sending a query to the server for a new grid. It gets a new grid and posts it on the EventBus.
    Since:
    10/31/2018
    Author:
    Justin Moore
